mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM rnum, t1.* from (SELECT * FROM post WHERE BOARD_ID = 4 ORDER BY REG_DT asc) t1 ) ORDER BY rnum desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST ( POST_ID ,TITLE ,POST_CONTENT ,DEL_YN ,REG_DT ,MDF_DT ,BOARD_ID ,USER_ID) VALUES ( post_seq.nextval ,#{title} ,#{postContent} ,'N' ,sysdate ,sysdate ,#{boardId} ,'limbh')
mapper.update: UPDATE POST SET VIEW_CNT = nvl(VIEW_CNT , 0) + 1 WHERE BOARD_ID = 4 AND POST_ID = #{postId}
UPDATE POST SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_ID = 4 AND POST_ID = #{postId}
